text: - Hey, guys.
Jeffery Self from Search Party.

Season two is coming, and we
had a party to celebrate in New
York, brought to you by JBL.
[MUSIC PLAYING]

OK, we are now in the room
where everybody first gathers.
You can feel the tension.
You can hear the suspense.

And you can touch
this velvet wall.

And we're going to go this
way, where it's very dark.

And please, tell my
mother I love her.

As you enter this
room, you can feel

Dory's heartbeat and the
guilt of her and her friends
as it's rising.
There are JBL speakers above me.
There are speakers besides me.
Everything is like tricked out.

Also, I'm about to
have a panic attack.

Here we are in the
basement level of the JBL
TBS Search Party Experience.

And if basements
weren't creepy enough,
this one's full of spooky boxes.

OK, let's see what's
in this first box.

There's a forest in
there, like the one
where they buried Keith's body!
What's in this box?

It's a hardware
store, like the one

they bought the
shovels to bury Keith's
body in the first place!
[SCREAMING]

So that is the experience we're
dealing with here at the season
two Search Party premiere.

And in about 15
minutes, this room

is going to be full of cast
members and fans of the show.

The music, the look, the
feeling is all exciting.

And now I'm
sufficiently terrified,

so I'm going to go find
a safe space to hide.
Bye.
Brought to you by JBL.
